oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ORGANIC FARMING MASTER AT BARCELONA UNIVERSITY. Fourteen years training specialists in Mediterranean Organic Farming
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lanzon, N.
Sans, F.X.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Education, extension and communication
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Since 1999, The University of Barcelona imparts the first Master in Organic Farming in Spain, with the aim of responding to the growing demand for professionals specialized in organic farming. This university has trained more than four hundred organic specialists. The diversity of the teaching staff, coming from numerous universities, research centers, Government Administration and private enterprises, offers the student a global vision of all the bio agri-food sectors.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Lanzon, N. and Sans, F.X. (2014) ORGANIC FARMING MASTER AT BARCELONA UNIVERSITY. Fourteen years training specialists in Mediterranean Organic Farming. Paper at: IFOAM Organic World Congress 2014, Istanbul, Turkey, 13-15 October 2014. [Completed]
